adrFormatAddress: 167 W 73rd St #3, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: When I hired Jerry I was frustrated, burned out, and on the verge of giving up on my career/business and business partner due to health reasons. We are still working together. It has not been easy. Jerry makes our sessions fun and exciting. Working with Jerry is really helping me realize that we do have a successful business and that we have to put in the work and time. There are many challenges for growth, but also the internal obstacles that were keeping me from advancing to the next level and I feel like Jerry has already helped us so much with that and makes you accountabl. She tells the hard truths but manages to give her message in a positive way.   I’m glad to have found her and be working with her. She is positive and has an energy about her that is really motivating. She is very knowledgeable in what she does. I can't wait to finish our journey together.  I would recommend Jerry as an executive or life coach to anyone who needs help in these areas. She is simply amazing.

I would recommend Jerry as an executive or life coach to anyone who needs help in these areas. She is simply amazing.

originalText.text:
Before I started working with Jerry, I was energetically squished and burned out from a job I left that really shut me down emotionally. During my first meeting with Jerry, I already felt myself coming back to life, and tapping into the mindset and authenticity I’d lost. Through her words and encouragement, I realized I needed to give myself permission to start being myself again. And it’s been amazing!

In just our second session, Jerry helped me up my income by encouraging me to negotiate a salary that I wouldn’t have DREAMED of asking. I was in the late stages of the interview process, in need of a job, and in a new city with bills to pay. I fired off the e-mail to HR asking for the salary I thought I deserved, and then proceeded to run around frantically my apartment and do jumping jacks in my kitchen just to get my jitters out. I’m not sure what my heart rate was at this moment...but it was high.

In the end, I was able to negotiate a salary that was 30% higher than in my previous job. I was blown away! In just the second session, the ROI in working with her proved to be in the positive. Money aside, this experience set the tone for me being brave, knowing what I am worth, and trusting my gut. I could go on and on about “wins” I’ve experienced with Jerry and nuggets of powerful statements exchanged during our sessions.   Hopping on calls with Jerry not only helps with getting unstuck mentally, but her system also holds me accountable so that I take real life action that lets me see results that really impact my life and how I feel. It’s a powerful experience. Every day, I'm ready to get to work and live big.

originalText.text:
Working with Jerry has been a phenomenal experience! Her skill set and heart are aligned to serving her clients to help us be better and happier versions of ourselves.

She is highly organized and I was able to track progress through a personalized software program that I could access between our sessions.  It is a structured high tech approach that keeps all of your notes, journals, scheduled coaching appointment dates, worksheets and "homework" in one place. It allows you to track progress on goals, and helps Jerry to see your progress, as well as hold you accountable.

I began working with Jerry in 2016, and started with her 3 month intensive coaching program. If you are serious about making serious life changes, throughout this program Jerry will make you take a hard look at your life to discover what's working and what's not. You may go in to coaching improve one specific area of your life. As you work with Jerry you are likely to find that as that one area of your life is improving, other areas of your life are improving too. Jerry cares about your professional life, personal life, health, and helps you to create strategy and action steps for meaningful improvement.

Since taking the 3 month intensive coaching course, during 2017, I was in coaching with Jerry as needed off and on. For 2018 and going forward, I plan to stay enrolled with Jerry for monthly Skype check-ins, with weekly write-in assessments/worksheets through the coaching portal.

What I most appreciate about Jerry is her 100% presence during sessions, her positive outlook and energy. Furthermore, it can be extremely helpful to have a fresh perspective from an objective 3rd party, especially on problems where I'm feeling stuck.

When I first contacted Jerry, she stressed to me the importance of choosing the right Coach. She even encouraged me to interview multiple Life Coaches to find the best fit. I reiterate that advice to anyone looking for a Coach. This advice is now something I tell my prospective clients as well. To my prospective clients, I stress the importance of choosing the right Realtor, and this has greatly improved the quality of my current client relations.

When you choose to work with a Professional Life Coach, you will be spending your money, as well as your time. In my experience, because I chose the right coach for me, every dollar and minute I've spent on coaching have been money and time well invested in my career, personal life, health, lifestyle, mindset, and happiness.

Highly recommend Jerry to anyone looking for the myriad of benefits that coaching can bring. I feel fortunate that I was able to find a coaching professional so well suited to my career and personality.

Thank you, Jerry, for being my Coach!

originalText.text:
I've only been working with Jerry for a month, but already the event I put on performed DOUBLE financially than it ever has before.
Jerry has really infectious positive energy!
1. She got me out of my head, and my mode of trying to figure out the "why" of stuff, and instead geared me toward real actionable items.
2. She is very organized in her approach, and yet, also lets you really guide the process. I love that she has lots of assignments to get you going, but also just works with me where I'm at in terms of my crazy busy agenda already.
3. The projects I bring to her, she helps me get clarification on my strategy. She listens to me as I'm spitballing, and sometimes finding my own answers (which sometimes we just need a sounding board), but then when I hit a wall, she brings her awesome ideas which have made a huge difference.
I could go on, but in short, she is really a great coach who GETS RESULTS, and I highly recommend  Jerry.

originalText.text: My experience working with Jerry was very helpful!  I gained overall confidence in my work.  I was able to prepare for and have some critical conversations that resulted in a a better work environment.  Jerry was very supportive and empathetic about all I was going through.  I am grateful for the time we worked together!
